title: 767 21 "A Volatile Situation! The Dog and the Cat and the Samurai"Transliteration: "Isshokusokuhatsu - Inu to Neko to Samurai!" (Japanese:一触即発 イヌとネコと侍！) Toshinori Fukuzawa Shōji Yonemura December 4, 2016(2016-12-04) TBA
transformers_text: 767 21 A Volatile Situation The Dog and the Cat and the Samurai Transliteration Is shoku so kuh a tsu In u to Neko to Samurai Japanese Toshi nori Fuku z awa Sh ji Yone mura December 4 2016 2016 12 04 TBA The monkey from the gate sees the two samurai and immediately rings the warning bell to warn the rest of the country Duke Dog storm and Master Cat Viper both mobilize their troops and rush to the ruin city to intercept them As they search the two kings run into each other and due to their intense rivalry prepare to fight Meanwhile Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hats race to find Kin ' em on and Kan j uro who have already reunited with Momo no suke and manage to stop them as they enter the city Kin ' em on upon seeing the two kings fight reveals himself and his comrades to the Minks announcing that they are from the Ko zuki clan in the Land of Wa no much to Luffy and the others horror However instead of attacking Dog storm and Master Cat Viper and the rest of the tribe all bow to the two samurai quickly explaining to the Straw Hats that they have been friends with Kin ' em on's clan and that they are like family to them Luffy and the others are then shocked to learn that Rai zo had indeed been on Zo u all along and that the entire country lied to Jack and the Beast Pirates to keep him safe Us opp then asks why they would all risk their lives for one person and Master Cat Viper replies that no matter what they'd never sell out their friends to which Luffy smiles
tf_idf_text: volatile situation dog cat samurai transliteration shoku kuh tsu neko samurai japanese toshi nori fuku awa yone mura december tba monkey gate see two samurai immediately ring warn bell warn rest country duke dog storm master cat viper mobilize troop rush ruin city intercept search two king run due intense rivalry prepare fight meanwhile luffy rest straw hat race find kin kan uro already reunite momo suke manage stop enter city kin upon see two king fight reveals comrade mink announce zuki clan land much luffy others horror however instead attack dog storm master cat viper rest tribe bow two samurai quickly explain straw hat friends kin ons clan like family luffy others shock learn rai indeed along entire country lie jack beast pirate keep safe opp asks would risk life one person master cat viper reply matter theyd never sell friend luffy smile
